translations.translation: In them are sweet, lovely maidens.
In them good and comely maidens --
In the midst of these will be maidens, good and comely.
There will be well-disciplined, beautiful maidens.
In them are women of good behaviour and gorgeous faces.
Therein (Gardens) will be Khayrat Hisan;
In them are goodly things, beautiful ones.
therein maidens good and comely --
Wherein (are found) the good and beautiful -
Therein will be maidens chaste and beautiful.
Therein will be damsels agreeable and beauteous.
In them are maidens good and lovely.
In them will be fair (Companions), good, beautiful;-
Therein (gardens) will be fair (wives) good and beautiful;
In them shall be good and pleasing.
In them are good and beautiful ones.
In them are good and beautiful women -
[55:70] In them, that is, in the two gardens and their palaces and what they comprise, are maidens [who are] good, in nature [and with], beautiful, faces.
(Wherein (are found) the good and beautiful) wives, i.e. good for their husbands.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فِيهِنَّ خَيْرَاتٌ حِسَانٌ } معناه جوارٍ واحدُها خَيرةٌ

translations.translation: And His saying, {in them are excellent things, beautiful} [means that] one of them is better than the other.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فِيهِنَّ } أي: في جنان هؤلاء الأبرار أيضاً { خَيْرَاتٌ } أزواج مصورة من مثوبات الأعمال والطاعات { حِسَانٌ } [الرحمن: 70] لا قبح معهن بوجه من الوجود، { فَبِأَيِّ آلاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ } [الرحمن: 71]
